desc_end_node: The workflow completion node. You can define the information returned by the workflow here.
ph_input_variable_value: Enter variable value, type "/" to insert variable
msg_custom_message_desc: If no custom message content is defined, the system will use the output of the previous LLM node or the specified reply node as the returned message by default. You can add up to 5 messages.
ph_text_message: Enter text message content, type / to insert variable
ph_image_message: Enter image message URL (will be automatically converted to image when sent), type / to insert variable
ph_voice_message: Enter voice message URL (will be automatically converted to voice when sent), type / to insert variable
